title: Young and Reckless - Crazy Brush font
content:
Need help with this font...sure hope it's not custom:

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [s\_thumb\_12487820006394c2f75dc23b93251b39ef51b7928dyrpurpwhite800x600.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120916092223/http:/typophile.com/files/s_thumb_12487820006394c2f75dc23b93251b39ef51b7928dyrpurpwhite800x600.jpg) | 150.42 KB |
author: joejohnson9182

comments.content: When the shapes are really extravagant and repeating characters aren't identical, this usually means it is a custom designed logo.
Ok I figured. Is there anything out there in this style?

It reminds me of Ray Larabie's [Still Time](http://web.archive.org/web/20120916092223/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/still-time/). You might also check at Dafont.com for Brush and Comic styles. Also might be worth checking Comicraft's collection, as this sort of dramatic lettering is sometimes seen in comic books.

- Mike Yanega

Another is Robert Arnow's [Streetbrush](http://web.archive.org/web/20120916092223/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/robarnow/streetbrush/).

- Mike Yanega
